title: "Understanding Radioactivity and Half-Life"
content: Neanderthals went extinct, radioactivity used to date objects, carbon 14 decay, uranium 238 half-life, radioisotopes decay like coin toss.

title: "Understanding Radioactivity and Using it to Determine Age"
content: Radioactivity is a random yet continuous process with a fixed half-life and varying levels of radioactivity, and it can be used to determine the age of Earth through uranium and lead decay in zircon crystals.
